review: Dr Nikhil has been treating our baby since the time he was born at Aster RV. under his guidance, our baby was in the NICU for 2 months. He is an exceptional doctor who has taken care of our baby along with his NICU team. He is always available if you need him. We would highly recommend him for your child's treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
